# [qraLm 0.1.1](https://vcadavez.github.io/qraLm/releases/tag/v.0.1.1) <small>2024-02-05</small>

A R package for quantitative risk assessment of *Listeria monocytogenes* in foods.

- Version developed within JEMRA group ...
- Used for the quantitative risk assessment of Frozen Vegetables, Diced RTE Cantaloupe and Smoked Fish.
